channel.title: Pop up instead of chat box

item.title: Pop up instead of chat box
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

[quote=“mike0631, post:7, topic:427959”][quote author=Nonamee link=topic=530648.msg3875372#msg3875372 date=1325635512]
Here’s the ::commands I have.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@ ~ SERVERNAME Player Commands ~", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::command1@red@", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@::command2@red@", 8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@etc.@red@", 8149); }
[/quote]

Thanks, that was where i was looking for.[/quote]

Np.

Read full topic

item.title: Pop up instead of chat box
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

You’ll need to make a interface client sided with lins interface maker and then use the command to open the interface.

Or you can create a new method like public void commandsInterface and store all the sendquest lines ect in there and then in the command just make it do that method with like commandsInterface()

item.title: Pop up instead of chat box
item.dc:creator: @mike0631 mike0631
item.description:
@mike0631 wrote:

Hello,
Since i thought of starting a new RSPS, i would like some help.

I have a command (::commands), But its made so it gives text in the chat.
Here is my code;

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("commands")){
			c.sendMessage("Player commands:");
			c.sendMessage(" ::blabla");
			c.sendMessage("");
			c.sendMessage("Moderator commands:");
			c.sendMessage(" ::blabla");
			}

How do i change it so a there comes a pop up, Like a scroll with the commands on it?

Tyvm

Read full topic
